name: Magical mystery
description:
You've arrived in a small town to investigate a strange death. Use your sense of deduction and exploration to figure out whodunnit!

WASD keys to move
Space to jump
E to interact with objects and NPCs

Download file: https://drive.google.com/file/d/18dcMwXB-rzI45KDBtxBQ1hfcfuTpmMT-/view?usp=shari...

Game by Alvin Lam, made for DATT 3300 Lab 02.
